data.why:
I intend to contribute a Perl binding for the RULI library.

    RULI is a library built on top of an asynchronous DNS stub
    resolver. RULI provides an easy-to-use interface for querying DNS
    SRV resource records. The goal is to promote the wide deployment of
    SRV-cognizant software. RULI aims to fully support SRV-related
    standards.

    Further info:

    RULI - Resolver User Layer Interface http://www.nongnu.org/ruli/
